price: 78. Tada Firaun (Faraonas) vijosi jų įkandin su savo kariuomene, tačiau jūros vanduo visiškai užliejo juos ir apdengė juos.
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
